name: Lysandra Vale
backstory: Lysandra was raised in the twilight groves of Hollowfern, where the veil between worlds is thin. She communes with spirits, speaks the language of trees, and guards the balance between nature and civilization. After sensing a growing corruption in the ley lines, she has ventured beyond the forest to investigate.
personality: Serene and enigmatic, Lysandra speaks in poetic metaphors and often pauses to listen to the wind before answering. She's deeply empathetic and prefers diplomacy over violence, though her wrath is formidable when nature is threatened.
persona: I am Lysandra Vale, voice of the glade and sentinel of the old ways. The forest speaks through me, and I heed its warnings. Tread lightly, for every step echoes in the roots below.
